title: Ripple
shortDescription: A subtle ripple for your background. If you set background-repeat:no-repeat; in your css, then you can use this as a divider.
instructions:
A radial gradient that is stretched over the entire width of the screen. Take a look at the code—it is easy to understand.

If you put this in a div with the css height equal to the height parameter, then it can be a nice shadowed divider for your page.
